import{GET_QUIZZES,ADD_QUIZZES}from'../actionType.js';import axios from"axios";export var getQuizzes=function getQuizzes(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/api/quizzes/all").then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_QUIZZES,payload:res.data});});};};export var addQuiz=function addQuiz(newQuiz){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/quizzes/addQuiz",newQuiz).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_QUIZZES,payload:res.data// a newQuiz object
});}).catch(function(err){return alert("ADD QUIZ ERROR ");});};};export var removeQuiz=function removeQuiz(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/quizzes/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch(getQuizzes());}).catch(function(err){return alert(err);});};};export var editQuizById=function editQuizById(id,inputData){return function(dispatch){axios.put("api/quizzes/".concat(id),inputData).then(function(res){return dispatch(getQuizzes);});};};
